item.title: 黑山的一家上诉法院确认，一名被称为 "加密货币之王 "的韩国大亨将被移交给他的祖国。
item.description:
An appeals court in Montenegro has confirmed that a South Korean mogul known as "the cryptocurrency king" will be handed over to his native country. https://t.co/Z2Ui9BtTZI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 科学家已经追踪到一颗小行星，其大小相当于纽约帝国大厦，预计将于 2182 年与地球擦肩而过。
item.description:
Scientists have tracked an asteroid the size of New York's Empire State Building that is expected to pass by Earth in 2182. https://t.co/h8s6Xh5cfb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）于去年 9 月签署了 AB 1228 号法案，该法案将从下月起适用于全国范围内拥有 60 家以上分店的快餐连锁店。
item.description:
Gov. Gavin Newsom signed AB 1228 into law last September, which will apply to fast food chains with more than 60 locations nationally beginning next month. https://t.co/PpZvTiSUAN pic.twitter.com/oKpVAMAVhG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 西弗吉尼亚州的一名男子正在自家门廊上安静地喝咖啡，突然目睹了警察在他家院子里的高速追捕。
item.description:
A West Virginia man quietly enjoying a cup of coffee on his porch suddenly became a witness to a high-speed police pursuit that tore across his yard. https://t.co/v9Zo7TfP8P pic.twitter.com/8CD4zzPpCB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 一家美国私营咨询公司提议运营预计每天从塞浦路斯部署到加沙海岸的国际援助船只，该计划将增加美国在这一动荡地区的存在。
item.description:
A private U.S. advisory firm is proposing to operate the anticipated daily deployment of international aid ships from Cyprus to the Gaza coast, in a plan that would increase American presence in the volatile region. https://t.co/wPGCFaACvt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 警方周三表示，一名同伙在一夜之间发动了一场无耻的袭击，将一名囚犯劫出了博伊西的一家医院，并开枪重伤了两名爱达荷州狱警。
item.description:
An accomplice staged a brazen attack to break a prison inmate out of a Boise hospital overnight, shooting and seriously wounding two Idaho corrections officers, police said Wednesday. https://t.co/GRgWbT3PJE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 自从梅森-拉姆齐（Mason Ramsey）在沃尔玛演唱约德尔歌的视频走红乐坛后，六年过去了。现在，这位 17 岁的年轻人正在为他的歌迷们带来新的音乐，并在北美各地进行巡演。
item.description:
It's been six years since Mason Ramsey exploded onto the music scene after a video of him yodeling at Walmart went viral.

Now, the 17 year old is delivering new music to his fanbase and touring across North America. https://t.co/k59RXErKiy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 沃恩-格辛（Vaughan Gething）周三当选威尔士第一大臣，成为英国第一位黑人政府领导人。
item.description:
Vaughan Gething was elected first minister of Wales on Wednesday, becoming the first Black leader of a government in the U.K. https://t.co/JPUuxFEBcG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 距离政府部分关门的最后期限仅剩几天时间，议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）表示，新谈判达成的拨款方案法案文本将于周三下午出炉。
item.description:
With just days until a partial government shutdown deadline, Speaker Mike Johnson said the newly negotiated bill text for the funding package will be out by Wednesday afternoon. https://t.co/sebzp097Zb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据司法部称，前兰金县治安官丹尼尔-奥普迪克（Daniel Opdyke）因参与 2023 年在密西西比州杰克逊市对两名黑人实施酷刑而被判处 17 年以上监禁。
item.description:
JUST IN: Former Rankin County sheriff's deputy Daniel Opdyke has been sentenced to more than 17 years in prison for his role in the torture of two Black men in Jackson, Mississippi, in 2023, according to the Dept. of Justice. https://t.co/gjvGCvPwG9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 费城地区的居民即将看到一个罕见的景象--一艘战舰顺着特拉华河漂流而下。
item.description:
Residents in the Philadelphia area are about to see a rare site — a battleship floating down the Delaware River. https://t.co/VRfVjj2M4b

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据报道，威尔士王妃凯特接受腹部手术并住院近两周的伦敦医院发生了安全漏洞，涉及凯特的医疗记录。
item.description:
The London hospital where Kate, the Princess of Wales, underwent abdominal surgery and a nearly two-week stay reportedly suffered a security breach involving Kate's medical records. https://t.co/Km7xIgZ6lK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 路易斯安那州的一名校车司机被誉为英雄，因为她在一辆校车被大火吞噬之前，奋不顾身地帮助九名儿童从车上下来。
item.description:
A Louisiana school bus driver is being hailed a hero after she jumped into action and helped nine children off a school bus before the vehicle was engulfed in flames. https://t.co/6wJPfN8F00

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国犬业俱乐部周三做客 @GMA，根据俱乐部的注册统计数据，揭晓了 2023 年最受欢迎的犬种：
item.description:
The American Kennel Club stopped by @GMA on Wednesday to reveal the most popular dog breeds in 2023, according to the club's registration statistics.

Check out their full list of top dogs: https://t.co/ypchOxoChM pic.twitter.com/pJq6mwEh13

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）对特朗普提出的暂缓执行其 4.64 亿美元民事欺诈判决的请求进行了反击，认为这位前总统最近提出的请求不可靠、程序不当，而且是基于一个有缺陷的前提。
item.description:
New York Attorney General Letitia James is pushing back on Trump's request for a stay of his $464 million civil fraud judgment, arguing the former president's recent request was unreliable, procedurally improper, and based on a flawed premise. https://t.co/SfNp15bFsA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡将于周三通过视频会议向共和党参议员发表讲话--此举是在参议院多数党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）呼吁以色列重新举行大选数日之后做出的。
item.description:
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will address Republican senators via a video conference on Wednesday — a move that comes days after Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer called for Israel to hold a new election. https://t.co/hDyx1MZERD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 新消息：在大选年关于美国汽车制造业未来的争论中，美国环保局宣布了新的汽车排放标准，这将迫使汽车行业生产更多的电动汽车。
item.description:
NEW: Amid a contentious election year debate over the future of U.S. auto manufacturing, the EPA has announced new vehicle emissions standards that will pressure the industry to make more electric vehicles. https://t.co/u4p6S5Pf0a

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 爆料：富尔顿县法官斯科特-麦卡菲（Scott McAfee）为前总统特朗普对法官的裁决提出上诉扫清了道路，该裁决最终让富尔顿县检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）继续处理干涉选举案。
item.description:
BREAKING: Fulton County Judge Scott McAfee has cleared the way for former Pres. Trump to appeal the judge's ruling that ultimately kept Fulton County DA Fani Willis on the election interference case. https://t.co/27wuZ8YUcS pic.twitter.com/qwkuu6EDAI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息富尔顿县法官斯科特-麦卡菲（Scott McAfee）为前总统特朗普对法官的裁决提出上诉扫清了道路，该裁决最终让富尔顿县检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）继续处理干涉选举案。
item.description:
JUST IN: Fulton County Judge Scott McAfee has cleared the way for former Pres. Trump to appeal the judge's ruling that ultimately kept Fulton County DA Fani Willis on the election interference case. https://t.co/m6x3GaKhsj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 今天上午，众议院监督委员会和司法委员会将在国会山举行弹劾听证会，共和党人正在对拜登总统及其家人进行的调查受到越来越多的关注。
item.description:
The House Oversight and Judiciary Committees are holding an impeachment hearing on Capitol Hill this morning amid growing scrutiny of Republicans' ongoing probe of Pres. Biden and his family. https://t.co/777Rll9oeF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据一个追踪执法人员自杀事件的非营利组织发布的报告称，在七年时间里，全国有 1200 多名公共安全人员死于自杀。
item.description:
More than 1,200 of the nation's public safety personnel died by suicide over a seven-year period, according to a report released by a nonprofit organization that tracks law enforcement suicides. https://t.co/RL7S5FSToX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息丹尼尔-彭尼（Daniel Penny）是一名前海军陆战队员，他于去年 5 月在纽约地铁车厢内掐死了一名流浪汉。
item.description:
JUST IN: Daniel Penny, the former Marine who choked a homeless man to death last May on a New York City subway car, will stand trial beginning Oct. 8, a judge determined Wednesday. https://t.co/n6pvzCtAoe pic.twitter.com/673IEp7kgp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 前尼克儿童频道制片人丹-施耐德（Dan Schneider）正在回应针对他的指控，这些指控在专题片《片场静悄悄》（Quiet on Set）中有所提及：儿童电视的黑暗面
item.description:
Former Nickelodeon producer Dan Schneider is responding to the allegations against him that were presented in the docuseries, "Quiet on Set: The Dark Side of Kids TV." https://t.co/7WnXMFdqer

item.title: 召回警报：乔氏超市（Trader Joe's）在一份在线声明中宣布，由于可能受到沙门氏菌污染，该店将召回部分批次的少盐 50%烘烤和加盐全腰果。
item.description:
RECALL ALERT: Trader Joe's is recalling certain batches of its 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Whole Cashews due to potential salmonella contamination, the store announced in a statement online. https://t.co/Ig4qJqheTT pic.twitter.com/SZzRW7rLUL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 法国监管机构周三再次对谷歌处以罚款，这与谷歌向法国出版商支付新闻费用的长期纠纷有关。
item.description:
Regulators in France hit Google with another fine on Wednesday tied to a long-running dispute over payments to French publishers for their news. https://t.co/UXoDnf7TQH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 麦当劳新推出的一款经济实惠的快餐订单在 TikTok 上疯传，社交媒体对这款订单赞不绝口。
item.description:
Social media is eating up a new budget-friendly fast-food order from McDonald's that's gone viral on TikTok. https://t.co/9j38AJncpu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据报道，长期为王室成员提供治疗的私立医院伦敦诊所的工作人员今年早些时候试图窥探凯特王妃的医疗记录。
item.description:
A British privacy watchdog said Wednesday it is looking into a report that staff at the London Clinic, a private hospital that has long treated the royals, tried to snoop on Princess Kate's medical records while she was a patient there earlier this year. https://t.co/tTIaQEVlmN pic.twitter.com/9HY9ACl6fe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 本周早些时候，加利福尼亚州议会通过了一项法案，修改了金州的新法律，将快餐业工人的最低工资提高到每小时 20 美元，并于 4 月 1 日生效。以下是变更内容：
item.description:
Earlier this week, the California General Assembly passed a bill that alters the Golden State's new law raising the minimum wage for fast food workers to $20 an hour, which goes into effect on April 1.

Here's what's changed: https://t.co/2gHd81pwMT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024
